Text:
You can apply safely this update after you install the popular "Microsoft Office 2011 14.0.0 Final for Mac (Volume Licensed)" torrent. 
It contains some improvements including the ability to reverse edit Chemdraw graphics pasted in Word documents (need ChemDraw 12.0.2 update, though)
It is freeware. The only important information here is that it SAFELY updates the existing torrent version. Maybe tomorrow the freeware version won't do that.(;-))

Thanks alot bjuice but can get a safe 14.0.2 Udate too? Thanks!
-Or is it safe to just update my office?

Yes dinodig it appears that 14.0.2 is also safe to apply to the available "Microsoft Office 2011 14.0.0 Final for Mac (Volume Licensed)". I have updated mine on both my iMac and MacBook Pro. Maybe I should upload an updated torrent, as well. Thanks!
